title: High Plat/Low Dia ADC LF Support
body:
Hi folks!

The title gives it away already , I am looking for a support that wants to play with me. I am currently Plat 2 and was Dia 5 last season.
I mostly play Jhin and Lucian, can play other ADs too though.
Also from time to time I play with other friends, so there will be the occasional full goon squad games :D
I use discord for voice communication (no download required) 

You should be at least Plat and have a positive attitude if u wanna play with me :)

So if you are interested just add me --> Raider Unleashed
